 # Body file for function Storage
 # Generated by TASTE on 2024-09-03 17:25:34
 # You can edit this file, it will not be overwritten
 # Provided interfaces : Get_Res, Last
 # Required interfaces : Get_Req, Sensor_data
 # User-defined properties for this function:
 #   |_ Taste::Datastore_size = 80
 #   |_ Taste::FDIR = NO
 #   |_ TASTE::Is_Component_Type = false
 #   |_ Taste::Needs_datastore = YES
 #   |_ Taste::Startup_Priority = 100
 # Timers              : 
 #
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6.4)
project(STORAGE C)

include_directories(fsw/mission_inc)
include_directories(fsw/platform_inc)

aux_source_directory(fsw/src APP_SRC_FILES)


# Create the app module
add_cfe_app(storage_app ${APP_SRC_FILES})

add_cfe_app_dependency(storage_app dataview_lib)


# Executive services source files
target_include_directories(storage_app PUBLIC ../../cfe/modules/es/fsw/src/)
target_link_libraries(storage_app PRIVATE core_private)

# If UT is enabled, then add the tests from the subdirectory
# Note that this is an app, and therefore does not provide
# stub functions, as other entities would not typically make
# direct function calls into this application.
if (ENABLE_UNIT_TESTS)
  add_subdirectory(unit-test)
endif (ENABLE_UNIT_TESTS)
